misc: Runs his mouth all the time
Constantly sees birds and other wildlife on the course
Might stand on the ball for quite some time in the tee box
biography: Juuso, a familiar face from Hyvinkään Golf, brings a unique energy to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Known for his incessant chatter and keen observations of the local wildlife, Juuso has participated in the Hector Trophée on eight separate occasions.

Do not be surprised if you see Juuso spending what seems like an eternity on the tee box, carefully considering his options. He is a meticulous player known for his strategic approach to the game. Though the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his enthusiasm and distinctive style make him a memorable presence in every tournament.
